Description: Middle East Paper Co (known as: Mepco) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL). Mepco operates within the Materials sector focusing on Paper Products. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Trading Companies and Distributors and Environmental and Facilities Services. Mepco is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 2000.

Shareholder Name: Abdulkader Al Muhaidib and Sons Co
